description: The old man was exercising near a park bench when Ash and Goh approached him. He told the that even his exercising couldn`t cheer him up when was dark in the city like it was. He explained to them that it had been about a week of it being night. He didn`t know what time it was, so he don`t know when to can eat. He also pointed out that since there`s no sun, the flowers have wilted and that the Murkrow are even depressed because they are thought of as being bad luck to see at night.
name: Ojiisan
